name: The Raph's Hardest Game
description:
This is a fangame project inspired in The World's Hardest Game by Snubby Land! :)

A place called Weirdland was destroyed by an advanced A.I. by the name of Scurimpuglimpus, and now you must work together with a mysterious ally to defeat it, and restore everything.

What does this fangame features?

  • Story Mode
  • 100 Levels
  • 5 Original Chiptune Soundtracks
  • Dark Theme
  • Unlockable Skins
  • New Graphics

The Story Mode was heavily inspired by the discord server C4's Weirdland and its wonderful people! But do not worry! in case you aren't part of it, this experience can still be enjoyed! (or hated, idk if this game is gud lol)

Dedicated specially for RaphTehBigBoss! :D

Feel free to send feedback to us! :)

Game logo by Nekiyoo.
